articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 delayed again, this time to December 2020 - Stevivor
articles.description: Cyberpunk 2077 has been delayed again, with CD Projekt Red now telling players they can expect the game on 10 December 2020.
articles.content:
Cyberpunk 2077 has been delayed again, with CD Projekt Red now telling players they can expect the game on 10 December 2020.
“Today, we’ve decided to move the release date of Cyberpunk 2077 by 21 da… [+977 chars]
